title: Vegetable Fried Rice
ingredients: ['275g (10 oz) long-grain white rice', '750ml (1 1/4 pints) water', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '5 eggs, beaten', '4 tablespoons soy sauce, divided', '2 stalks celery, thinly sliced', '100g (4 oz) mushrooms, sliced', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 (220g) tin bamboo shoots, drained', '2 carrots, shredded', '75g (3 oz) mange-tout', '3 spring onions, sliced']
